title: Senate Passes CR Ending Shutdown Threat Until Early 2024
summary: The Senate passed a Continuing Resolution to keep the government funded until early 2024 late tonight. The unusual “laddered” bill passed the House yesterday and sets two different dates for […]

title: Cathy Koerner to Take Over Artemis Program as Jim Free Moves Up to AA
summary: NASA’s Artemis program is about to get a new head, Cathy Koerner, as Jim Free moves up to Associate Administrator, the agency’s top civil servant. Bob Cabana, the current AA, […]

title: Starship cleared for Nov. 17 launch
summary: SpaceX received the final regulatory approvals Nov. 15 that allow the company to proceed with the second integrated Starship/Super Heavy launch, scheduled for as soon as the morning of Nov. 17.

title: FAA Approves Second Starship Test Flight, SpaceX Targeting Friday

title: ULA chief on the Vulcan rocket: “The path to flight one is clear”
summary: "We are expecting Blue to keep up with us."
